abstract: Biogen Idec confirmed it had received notice from Carl C. Icahn that he intends to nominate three people to its board as he seeks to expand his influence at one of the world’s biggest biotech companies.
snippet: Biogen Idec confirmed it had received notice from Carl C. Icahn that he intends to nominate three people to its board as he seeks to expand his influence at one of the world’s biggest biotech companies.
lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec confirmed on Thursday it has received notice from Carl C. Icahn that he intends to nominate three people to its board as he seeks to expand his influence at one of the world’s biggest biotech companies.

headline.main: Biogen Confirms Icahn’s Bid for 3 Board Seats
